name: Shield of Faith
components: V, S, M (parchment with a holy text written on it)
text: This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the target that averts and deflects attacks. The spell grants the subject a +2 deflection bonus to AC, with an additional +1 to the bonus for every six levels you have (maximum +5 deflection bonus at 18th level).
mythicText: Add half your tier to the spell’s deflection bonus.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (写有神圣文字的羊皮纸)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 此法术创造出一种闪着微光的魔法场，保卫着受术者以防御敌人的攻击。受术者的AC获得+2偏斜加值，同时施法者每6级多获得1点偏斜加值 (最多在18级时获得+5偏斜加值)。
mythicText_zh: 将你的阶层的一半加到法术的偏斜加值上。
